question: Which {location} experienced the {stats} {method} of {col} drop compared between October and December in the year {year} ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data['Timestamp'].dt.year == {code_year}]
    data = data[(data['Timestamp'].dt.month == 10) | (data['Timestamp'].dt.month == 12)]
    data = data.groupby(["{code_location}", data['Timestamp'].dt.month])["{code_col}"].{code_method}.reset_index()
    data = data.pivot(index="{code_location}", columns='Timestamp', values='{code_col}')
    data['diff'] = data[10] - data[12]
    data = data.dropna(subset="diff")
    data = data.sort_values(by="diff")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}].name)


true_code()
